name: SupportFranzAndSeth
_source: speak;Franz;Fine.|I may be young, but I'm every bit a Knight of Renais.|I'll fight to the end to protect the princess, just like you, sir!
speak;Seth;Good, good!|That's the spirit!|You know, you're looking much improved from when we set out.
speak;Franz;Hm.|Do you really think so, General?
speak;Seth;Oh, definitely.|You seem much more sure of yourself.|All doubt has left your face.|By the time you reach my age, you'll be the finest spear and swordsman around.
speak;Franz;Honestly?|Sir, do you really believe that?
speak;Seth;...I do...|But we are in a battle right now, Franz.|Concentrate on the enemies before you, and don't get too cocky.
speak;Franz;Yes, sir!!!|You know I'd never let you down, sir!
speak;Seth;Don't be too eager for success.|Know your limits.
speak;Seth;Ah,Franz.|Every time I see you, you're getting better and better.|Your parry is a little stiff, but you are clearly improving.
speak;Franz;Are you serious?|Do you really think so, sir?
speak;Seth;...Why is it that, when I compliment you, you always ask me that?
speak;Franz;Oh, so sorry...|I appreciate your praise, sir.|I mean, you're General Seth, the Silver Knight.|You're my hero.

speak;Franz;Do you remember when Grado's forces overran Castle Renais?|Despite grave injuries, you outcharged the enemy, broke their lines, and escaped.|And then, you delivered the princess, on your own, to Frelia safely.|If I were you, I doubt I could have survived such a challenge...|You are the only person I know who can make impossible feats possible.

speak;Seth;What pressure you put on me!|How can I possibly fail now?|You would lose all faith in me!|Ah, but, Franz, you're still young.|You will grow into a remarkable warrior, I have no doubt.|Be confident. I'm counting on you.|Train your mind and hone your skills.
speak;Franz;Really?|Do you really think so, General?
speak;Seth;All right, back into the fray!|Let's go, Franz!
speak;Franz;Yes, General!|And remember, I've got your back!
speak;Franz;Oh, General!|How are you, sir?|I'm so honored that you came to talk to me.
speak;Seth;Must you always overreact?|...Honestly, Franz...|I'm the one who should feel honored.
speak;Franz;I beg your pardon?|What do you mean, sir?

speak;Seth;When I was just a squire, there was one knight whom I admired above all others.|His skill with sword and spear was legendary.|He was truly peerless.|We squires learned the meaning of chivalry watching him serve the king.|Ten years back, we received word that an infamous assassin was hiding in Renais.|This knight hunted him down in secrecy so as not to alert the assassin.|He hounded the villain and killed him, but he was mortally wounded...
speak;Franz;Ten years ago?|But that's when-!?|No, it couldn't be...
speak;Seth;...Yes, Franz.|It was the greatest knight in the history of Renais.|Your father.

speak;Franz;...I was so young when my father died.|And our mother passed away before he did.|Forde and I were almost always alone.|Oh, I remember how I used to cry like a babe about my father being gone so much.|Forde would always remind me, “He is serving the royal family to protect Renais.”|Forde was so proud of our father, but he was also a little bit sad.|I remember a deep scar he had on his shoulder, probably in battle.|My brother and I used to climb up his shoulders and vie for his attention.|I grew up hearing what a great knight he was, but I remember only his shoulder.

speak;Seth;...You probably have no idea how much you resemble your father.|Your swordplay, how you tilt the lance, your loyalty to Renais...|You've certainly inherited your father's spirit.|It is an honor to see the skill I once idolized developing in you, his son.

speak;Franz;I...I am so flattered to hear that.|Thank you very much, General.|Someday, I will become a knight even greater than my brother or my father.|To restore Renais, the kingdom to which I've sworn my blade, I will fight on!
speak;Seth;Thank you, Franz.|Let's do the best we can.|For Renais, and for your father.
